name: Dovecot ACL Administrator
short_description:
Dovecot ACL Administrator provides a simple GUI for...IMAP ACL Administration.  Currently consisting of some simple PHP, combined with SSH calls to allow administration of remote Dovecot servers.  This uses the Dovecot "doveadm" command to obtain low-level information and so is not suitable for non-Dovecot IMAP implementations.

At the moment this is a bare-bones implementation.  A prettier interface is envisioned and certainly desired - at this time the focus is function.  A possible enhancement will allow end-user logins as well - at this time the rights are system-wide and not appropriate for end-users.
summary: Web-based PHP-driven Dovecot IMAP ACL Administration
